plot: The Iranian American painter and poet Mahvash Mossaed narrates her emergence from the crucible of womanhood with a poignant bled of artwork, poetry and candid commentary.
title: Unveiling: I Paint a Woman's Life in My Culture
plot_es: The Iranian American painter and poet Mahvash Mossaed narrates her emergence from the crucible of womanhood with a poignant bled of artwork, poetry and candid commentary.
original_name: Unveiling: I Paint a Woman's Life in My Culture
